version_description:
Improved camera;
New coins in free roam;
Short versions of Desert racing track;
Time limit in Bomb and Crown decreased to 4 minutes;
Bug fixes

- New HUNT mode! Collect gear or knock them out from other players!
- 2 new cars Toyota Supra and Toyota AE86!
- New decals and rims.
- Task system in a free roam mode: VIP escort and drag racing!
- Chest improvements: lower price and more useful cards.
- Career added: additional gold earnings.
- We changed tuning, a part of installed parts got mixed up, that's why we grant every player 15 gold and 50 000 silver!

Gather pumpkins and buy exclusive tuning on Halloween 2020! The event will last till November 12, all collected pumpkins will disappear after this date. Hurry up and spend them on:
- Unique parts and accessories
- Halloween's decals
- Horrifying rims

New car Quadra from Cyberpunk 2077.

Gather pumpkins and buy exclusive tuning on Halloween 2020! The event will last till November 12, all collected pumpkins will disappear after this date. Hurry up and spend them on:
- Unique parts and accessories
- Halloween's decals
- Horrifying rims

New car Quadra from Cyberpunk 2077.

- 3 new cars
- Advanced tuning of wheels and tires
- New Year's event until January 20 with special tuning
- Daily random reward and etc.

- Now there are shadows under cars
- And you can install neon lights
- No more of your favorite bugs
- But you can change mirrors and headlights (only on Siesta right now)

Roulette has come back!
Two new cars: Silvia S and Toretto
New mirrors, headlights and rear lights for all cars
21 new rims
17 new decals
2 new tasks for free roam mode: team race and team drift

Bug fixes:
- disappearing players;
- disappearing boosters in racing;
- disappearing BMW;
- voice chat.

Two new cars: GMC F82 and TOBIM 350Z
37 new rims
14 new decals
New interface in game

New car: Quattro RS5
New functions of free camera
Challenge system
Speed cameras
Pursuit task
Updated car store
Bug fixes
Bugfix, optimization, increased rewards in game modes and challenges, camera timeout after gold medal received
